summary: Java full stack developer with 3+ years of full-stack experience and 5+ years total software development experience, specializing in backend Java (Spring) and frontend Web technologies, with hands-on expertise in RESTful services, microservices, and database integrations (MySQL, MongoDB).

experience.title: Backend JAVA developer
experience.description: Developed backend RESTful web services within a microservice architecture for a system storing educational information. Implemented authentication/authorization with Spring Security, worked with MongoDB and MySQL, wrote and ran JUnit tests, and fixed defects. Implemented JSON Web Token-based user authentication; used Swagger UI for API exploration. Technologies used: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate ORM, JSON, REST, MySQL, MongoDB, JPA, Maven, JDBC, Apache Tomcat, JUnit, HTML5, CSS3.

experience.title: Full stack JAVA developer
experience.description: Prepared non-standard reports by executing queries on SQL databases. Built a simple web interface for entering a request and displaying results in a user-friendly form (HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript). Performed hardware and software installations and provided high-level customer care, training, and technical support.

experience.title: Software R-Style language developer
experience.description: Performed hardware and software installations and provided high-level customer care, training, and technical support. Introduced changes to the terms of service for bank products into the business logic of the program code (R-Style Language).

education.degree: Master's degree in Computer Science and Information Technology
